attributes.action: Give Nigel Farage a Knighthood for his work in restoring British democracy
attributes.background: Without the efforts of Nigel Farage and his UKIP party, we would never have had this referendum; the single most important vote in many generations. He deserves recognition as the saviour of United Kingdom democracy

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
